message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.RO

This paper discusses the use of neural networks for artificial intelligence, specifically in the context of lifelong learning and reducing catastrophic forgetting. The paper also mentions the use of reinforcement learning and regularization techniques. Based on these topics, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), cs.CV (Computer Vision), and cs.RO (Robotics).
